# ui:slotFilled


Check if a slot has content.

## Example
```html
<f:if condition="{ui:slot.filled()}">
    // Slot has content
</f:if>
```
 

## Arguments

| Name | Type | Description | Required | Default |
|------|------|-------------|----------|--------|
| `name` | string | Name of the slot | No | SlotViewHelper::DEFAULT_SLOT |
